ConfigFile.description: Relative or absolute path to the config file

AutoMap.description: If AutoMap is enabled, it is required that the file alreaady exists for AMP to use as a template. AMP will then automatically map the field values based on the ParamFieldName. You can use The JPath syntax (foo.bar.baz) to use if you need to access a nested structure

Importable.description: If AutoMap and Importable are enabled this will allow users to import settings from an existing config file into AMP. This setting is experimental and supports INI, KVP, JSON, and XML

items.title: Subsection
items.description: The key maps to the key in App.AppSettings, the value is what will be used as the setting name in the resulting ini file. Ini files have multiple headings, but KVP files don't. Use $root in this cirucumstance and only have on set of categories

ConfigFormat.description: {0} is replaced with the setting key and {1} with the value
